content.para: After 12 months of hard work, we are proud to announce the Release Candidate 1 of Carrot2 version 3.0. The 3.0 release introduces significant improvements in all areas of the framework:

The 3.0 release introduces a brand new GUI application for experimenting and tuning clustering.
You can use Clustering Workbench to quickly start clustering your own data or to tune clustering results.

Brand new Web Application View online

Web Application has been reimplemented for easier customization and top front-end performance. We also included an attractive visualization.

content.p: If you have concerns about choosing between the 2.x and 3.0 versions or migrating from 2.x to 3.0, please see the release 3.0 Frequently Asked Questions.
